name: The Railroad Murder
description:
(NOTE: This is an unfinished version of the game. The current player and NPC sprites are not ours, they're publicly available ones, and there's only 1 investigation available in the story)

The Railroad Murder is a single player, narrative driven 2D side scroller. It's set in the 1950’s where a tragic murder occurs in a moving train. You will take control of a detective that happened to be on said train as the murder took place. Explore, find clues and talk to witnesses and potential suspects to unravel this mystery.

Controls:
-Interact with things by left-clicking them
-Press I to open your Inventory
-Press Esc to open the Pause Menu

After trying the game please fill out this form with your feedback to help us improve it:
https://forms.gle/9p7BgPXvCd3RPyPN6
